departureFlight.from: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

returnFlight.to: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

localTransport.details: Arrange for a pre-booked taxi from the airport to your accommodation. Consider renting scooters for local travel, ensuring valid license and helmet use.

activities.title: Arrival in Goa & Transfer to Vagator
activities.description: Arrive at Dabolim Airport (GOI). Meet your pre-booked taxi and transfer to Casa Vagator in North Goa. Check in and freshen up.

activities.title: Lunch at Curlies
activities.description: Enjoy a leisurely lunch at Curlies Beach Shack known for its seafood and scenic views.

sustainableAlternative.title: Explore Local Goan Thali at a Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit a Local Goan Restaurant and enjoy the Goan Thali, where all the ingredients are locally sourced
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Help local Goan community and their business to flourish.

activities.title: Vagator Beach Exploration
activities.description: Explore the cliffs and rock formations of Vagator Beach. Enjoy the sunset views from Chapora Fort.

sustainableAlternative.title: Beach Clean-up
sustainableAlternative.description: Dedicate an hour to cleaning up the beach. Bring your own gloves and trash bags.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces pollution and protects marine life.

activities.title: Dinner at Antares
activities.description: Enjoy fine dining with a view at Antares, a restaurant known for its modern European cuisine and vibrant atmosphere.

activities.title: Anjuna Flea Market (Wednesday)
activities.description: Visit the famous Anjuna Flea Market for souvenirs, clothes, and local handicrafts. (Market only open on Wednesdays)

sustainableAlternative.title: Visit a Local Artisan Workshop
sustainableAlternative.description: Instead of the flea market, visit a local artisan workshop to buy directly from the makers, supporting fair trade practices.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Promotes sustainable livelihoods and ethical consumerism.

activities.title: Lunch at Artjuna
activities.description: Have lunch at Artjuna, a cafe known for its healthy and organic food options.

activities.title: Spice Plantation Tour
activities.description: Take a guided tour of a local spice plantation. Learn about the different spices grown in Goa and enjoy a traditional Goan lunch.

sustainableAlternative.title: Visit a Local Farm
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit a local farm that promotes organic farming and learn about sustainable agriculture practices.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces the impact of commercial agriculture on the enviornment.

activities.title: Dinner at Thalassa
activities.description: Enjoy a Greek dinner with stunning sunset views at Thalassa. (Reservations recommended)

activities.title: Watersports at Baga Beach
activities.description: Head to Baga Beach and enjoy various water sports activities like parasailing, jet skiing, and banana boat rides.

sustainableAlternative.title: Kayaking in the Backwaters
sustainableAlternative.description: Enjoy a peaceful kayaking trip through the Goan backwaters. Observe the local wildlife and mangrove ecosystems.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Promotes eco-tourism and supports local guides.

activities.title: Lunch at Britto's
activities.description: Have lunch at Britto's, a popular beach shack on Baga Beach known for its Goan and Continental cuisine.

activities.title: Explore Calangute
activities.description: Visit Calangute Beach, explore the local shops, and enjoy the bustling atmosphere.

sustainableAlternative.title: Explore the Local Churches
sustainableAlternative.description: Explore the local heritage and historic churches

activities.title: Dinner at Fisherman's Wharf
activities.description: Enjoy a seafood dinner at Fisherman's Wharf, known for its fresh catches and Goan specialties.

activities.title: Dudhsagar Falls Trip
activities.description: Take a day trip to Dudhsagar Falls, one of India's tallest waterfalls. Enjoy a jeep safari through the jungle and a swim in the natural pool.

sustainableAlternative.title: Nature Walk at Bhagwan Mahavir Wildlife Sanctuary
sustainableAlternative.description: Instead of visiting the falls, take a guided nature walk through the Bhagwan Mahavir Wildlife Sanctuary to observe local flora and fauna.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces the environmental impact of jeep safaris and promotes wildlife conservation.

activities.title: Lunch Near Dudhsagar (Included in Trip)
activities.description: Lunch will be provided as part of the Dudhsagar Falls tour.

activities.title: Return to Vagator
activities.description: Travel back to your accommodation in Vagator.

activities.title: Farewell Dinner at Pisco by the Cliff
activities.description: Enjoy the last dinner at a restaurant that offers great food and service.

activities.title: Morning at Leisure
activities.description: Enjoy a leisurely morning at your accommodation. Relax by the pool, have breakfast, or take a walk around the neighborhood.

sustainableAlternative.title: Visit a Local Charity
sustainableAlternative.description: Spend a few hours volunteering at a local charity or NGO.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Contributes to community development and social welfare.

activities.title: Check Out
activities.description: Check out from Casa Vagator.

activities.title: Lunch at Vinayak Family Restaurant
activities.description: Have lunch at a restaurant of your choice, or visit Vinayak Family Restaurant

activities.title: Transfer to Airport
activities.description: Transfer to Dabolim Airport for your departure.
